definition: a usually iced drink of wine or distilled liquor mixed with flavoring ingredients

definition: a drink, usually with a lot of alcohol in it, made by mixing different drinks together
a combination of substances, especially ones that are harmful when used together
a combination of things, for example emotions, especially one with an unpleasant or dangerous result
in: The smoke contains a cocktail of toxic chemicals.
a disturbing cocktail of sex and violence

definition:
1. An iced drink of wine or distilled liquor mixed with flavoring ingredients, something resembling or suggesting such a drink. Came from a bartender who mixed her drinks with rooster tail feathers. One night a man came in and asked for "One of those cock-tails", and thus the phrase was born.

2. A solution of agents taken together for medical treatment
